channel.description: Create a vm in proxmox and copy the physical drive to the vm drive. Create New VM in proxmox In the OS tab, select “Do not use any media” Verify Kernel version [root@server10 conf.d]# hostnamectl Static hostname: server10.example.com Icon name: computer-server Chassis: server Machine ID: 22baa6004a0f4bb59217ab20b4d981c7 Boot ID: 35a631cc684348a4872db20ddb169a8a Operating System: AlmaLinux 8.10 (Cerulean Leopard) CPE OS Name: cpe:/o:almalinux:almalinux:8::baseos Kernel: Linux 4.18.0-553.8.1.el8_10.x86_64 Architecture: x86-64Check the boot partition for BIOS or UEFI
